intro: A curated selection of papers, preprints, and conference contributions.

entries.title: Low-pressure CVD grown Si-doped β-Ga₂O₃ films with promising electron mobilities and high growth rates
entries.authors: Khan, S. A., Ibrelić, A., Margiotta, S., & Bhuiyan, A. F. M.
entries.description: Reports low-pressure CVD growth of Si-doped β-Ga₂O₃ with strong electron mobility and high growth rates, supporting improved device-grade epitaxy.

entries.title: Radiation resilience of β-Ga₂O₃ Schottky barrier diodes under high dose gamma radiation
entries.authors: Khan, S. A., Saha, S., Singisetti, U., & Bhuiyan, A. F. M.
entries.description: Examines performance stability and radiation-induced effects in β-Ga₂O₃ Schottky barrier diodes under high-dose gamma exposure.

entries.title: Placeholder Book Chapter Title
entries.description: Short description placeholder for a future book chapter entry.

entries.title: Internet of Things (IoT) Based Bangla Calendar Clock
entries.authors: Saleh Ahmed Khan, Tiasa Mondal, Sadat Tahmeed Azad, Abdullah Jubair Bin Iqbal, Sajid Muhaimin Chowdhury
entries.venue: 2023 International Conference on Computer and Information Technology (ICCIT), 2023
entries.description: Presents an IoT-based system for a Bangla calendar clock concept, integrating embedded sensing and connected time/calendar display logic.
